definition: to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind

sentences.english: “Don’t make a fool of yourself, ” I thought. “Just watch.”
sentences.chinese: “不要出丑”我思忖着“就看看吧。”

sentences.english: He mused about whether his proposal would be accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他思忖着他的建议是否会被接纳。

sentences.english: It was a sign of the times, he thought.
sentences.chinese: 他思忖，这是时代的趋势。

sentences.english: I could not hinder myself from pondering on the question-Had he had fair play?
sentences.chinese: 我自己禁不住在思忖着，他可曾受到公平的待遇？

sentences.english: The man sitting opposite me lit a cigarette and thought.
sentences.chinese: 这人坐在我的对面，他点了一支烟，思忖着。

sentences.english: The rich brocade wondered in a short meantime and seemed the proposal of creature thinking the vegetable E.
sentences.chinese: 锦绣思忖了一会儿，似乎是在考虑素娥的提议。

definition: to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to think sth through/to consider carefully
to speculate/to surmise/to wonder whether/to guess
to think hard/bitter thoughts/to pour out one's sufferings
to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles/to ponder
to consider/to deliberate/to fill up a cup to the brim
